section.para: To view Work Order schedules by Item, select the "Work Order Schedule by Item" option. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: To edit a Work Order after it has been created, use the right-click menu in any of the "Work Order Schedule by..." displays. There you will find an "Edit W/O" option.

section.para: When displaying Work Order schedules by Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item whose Work Order schedules you want to view. The browse button located to the right of the field leads to a searchable list of make and buy items.
Work Orders scheduled on and after this date will be displayed.
Work Orders scheduled on and before this date will be displayed.
Select to display the Work Order schedule by Item for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Work Order schedule by Item you want to display.

varlistentry.term: Only Show Released and In-Process W/O"s

listitem.para: Select to display only released and in-process Work Order schedules. Selecting this option means only Work Orders whose Status is released ("R") or in-process ("I") will be displayed.

varlistentry.term: Only Show Top Level Work Orders

listitem.para: Select to display only top level Work Orders. Top level Work Orders are Work Orders that have not been created to meet the component demands of a parent Work Order.

Display lists Work Order schedules by Item, using the specified parameters. The start dates and end dates are color-coded for ease of use. Both dates will display in red type if the Work Order is not yet in-process and is also past due. Once a Work Order's Status is changed to in-process "I", the start date will automatically revert to black type.
Select to automatically update the display every five minutes.
